description:
Policy evaluation is critical in helping to decide
whether to expand, modify, or terminate a program or
policy. The objective of this module is to provide
students with the knowledge and skills required to
understand and conduct policy evaluation. The
module will build on the foundational analytical skills
taught in PP5406.
The focus is on rigorous quantitative evaluation tools.
These will be taught using case studies and datasets
that will allow students to identify the strengths and
weaknesses of these methods and learn how to
apply them to a policy problem of their choice.
title: Advanced Research Methods for Public Policy
